     #[test]
     fn test_keywords_in_use_stmt() {
-        assert_snapshot!(

-            @r###"

-            kw self
-            kw super::
-        "###
+        check(
+            r"use <|>",
+            expect![[r#"
+                kw crate::
+                kw self
+                kw super::
+            "#]],
         );
 
-        assert_snapshot!(

             kw super::
-        "###
+        "#]],
         );
 
-        assert_snapshot!(
-            get_keyword_completions(r"use a::{b, <|>}"),
-            @r###"
+        check(
+            r"use a::{b, <|>}",
+            expect![[r#"
             kw self
             kw super::
-        "###
+        "#]],
         );
     }
